drupalNodeEvent.title: ‘Feminist’ as a problematic tag: young Chinese women distancing themselves from a feminist identity and the rising feminist zeal

field_description.processed: With increasingly visible online discussions of feminism globally, China seems to usher in a period of avowing feminism. This paper discusses the preliminary findings of a qualitative doctoral study of young Chinese women’s attitudes towards feminism which found a more complicated picture. Based on forty online interviews, this paper particularly discusses the reasons why young Chinese women shunned a feminist identity in an era with a seemingly rising feminist zeal.
